headline.sub: Actor Philip Seymour Hoffman's family and friends attend wake
headline.main: Actor Philip Seymour Hoffman's family and friends attend wake

docs.snippet: Actor Philip Seymour Hoffman's family and friends arrive for wake, to bid their final farewell to the beloved actor. Rough Cut (no reporter narration)....
docs.lead_paragraph: Actor Philip Seymour Hoffman's family and friends arrive for wake, to bid their final farewell to the beloved actor. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).

docs.snippet: Sean Kilpatrick scored 26 points, and Justin Jackson led a second-half surge that rallied No. 7 Cincinnati to its 15th straight win, 63-58 over No. 22 Connecticut on Thursday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: Sean Kilpatrick scored 26 points, and Justin Jackson led a second-half surge that rallied No. 7 Cincinnati to its 15th straight win, 63-58 over No. 22 Connecticut on Thursday night.

headline.print_headline: Past Fictions, Lack of Trust and No Deal
headline.main: Past Fictions, a Lack of Trust and No Deal in SAC Case

docs.snippet: Mathew Martoma seemed to be able to cut a deal with prosecutors, but his handling of a years-old episode involving fabrication of documents casts doubt on his trustworthiness, James B. Stewart writes in the Common Sense column....
docs.abstract: Mathew Martoma seemed to be able to cut a deal with prosecutors, but his handling of a years-old episode involving fabrication of documents casts doubt on his trustworthiness, James B. Stewart writes in the Common Sense column.

docs.snippet: Hopeful forecasts overshadowed ho hum post holiday results for retailers. Bobbi  Rebell reports....

headline.print_headline: China's Jan HSBC Services PMI Falls to 50.7, Lowest in 2.5 Years
headline.main: China's Jan HSBC Services PMI Falls to 50.7, Lowest in 2.5 Years

docs.snippet: China's services sector grew at its slowest pace in almost 2-1/2 years in January after firms secured a smaller volume of new business, a private survey showed, adding to growing signs of slackening in the Chinese economy....
docs.lead_paragraph: China's services sector grew at its slowest pace in almost 2-1/2 years in January after firms secured a smaller volume of new business, a private survey showed, adding to growing signs of slackening in the Chinese economy.

headline.print_headline: 50,000 Texts Handed Over in Maine Divorce Case
headline.main: 50,000 Texts Handed Over in Maine Divorce Case

docs.snippet: A Maine supreme court justice says a cellphone company turned over more than 50,000 text messages in a divorce case in which a protection order was in place....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Maine supreme court justice says a cellphone company turned over more than 50,000 text messages in a divorce case in which a protection order was in place.

docs.snippet: Haley Peters scored 17 points, Tricia Liston had 15 points and 10 rebounds and No. 5 Duke bounced back from its first Atlantic Coast Conference defeat with its 18th straight win over Clemson, 78-51 on Thursday night....

headline.print_headline: IBM Explores Sale of Semiconductor Business: Financial Times
headline.main: IBM Explores Sale of Semiconductor Business: Financial Times

docs.snippet: IBM Corp is exploring the sale of its semiconductor business and has hired Goldman Sachs to find potential buyers, the Financial Times reported on Thursday, citing sources familiar with the matter....
docs.lead_paragraph: IBM Corp is exploring the sale of its semiconductor business and has hired Goldman Sachs to find potential buyers, the Financial Times reported on Thursday, citing sources familiar with the matter.
